title: Re: Post Your non-Keen-related Artwork
content:
You win!

No really you do. You win JUST because you have one of Bill Waterson's characters in there.

Hmm other non Keen arts? Well you might of saw these already but I know no one here checks my DA account so...

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Self-portrait.jpg[/img]
It's made of construction paper that we cut out and layered on top of the piece underneath. We based it off of a photograph our teacher took and then increased the contrast on. We were only allowed 4 colors.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Worst-pun.jpg[/img]
It's the um... Worst pun ever...

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Drac-Kreuz-200px.png[/img]
My dragon (Red) character and my most excellent friend's dragon (Pink / peach) character, sitting back to back. I am very fond of this one.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Droom-scene-BW.png[/img]
A black and white piece I was pretty fond of. I think it's the best B&W thing I ever did so far. Sure there are a lot of mistakes but I just like the way it looks.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Draconis---Laurael-commere.png[/img]
Ok OKAY! Not exactly "Non-Keen-Related" but it's cute.
Lookitim! ^_^

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Aya.jpg[/img]
You might know this character if you like Online Comics.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Wicked.jpg[/img]
Heh... WICKED!

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/Lonely.png[/img]
Another try at black and white. (This time with grey!) Looks ok... but not as good as the other one.

[img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/way-high-up.jpg[/img]
Way high up.
Not one of the BEST pieces I ever did but this is by far my FAVORITE piece I ever did. It's my dragon character, (Once again red.) and my good friend's dragon character (The pink bubble dragon.) having some trouble with helium.

Well that's just a taste of Gal's Gallery. Hope it wasn't too painful to look at.

(And sorry about the resizing of the images... ever since I put in my new video card Photoshop doesn't anti-alias the images good anymore. I don't know why.)-----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://i34.photobucket.com/albums/d134/Galaxieretter/New-blegd-smeeg-banner-60.png[/img][/url]

title: Re: Post Your non-Keen-related Artwork
content:
Woah, some excellent art here! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] You're pretty skilled in pixel art, allstories!

That white/gray/black mountain scene is the best of those images by Gal, I think. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Lauren (IIRC) and Red picture doesn't look bad either.

I don't really have any stuff to contribute.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Spleenwork
content:
I've been drawing constantly for about a week, especially the past couple of days.

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/drawings]jimsoft.spatang.com/drawings[/url]

Hehe, rendered with crayon since that's all I could find at my cousin's place where I've been staying for the weekend.

Technically the tilesheet is Keen related, but I'm sure that can be forgiven.

I plan to setup a gallery for this stuff at my site (jimage.org), but I'm still looking for a decent PHP image gallery script.

title: Re: Spleenwork

You know what your characters remind me of Spleen?

The way they draw lemmings. You know... in the lemmings games.

title: Inspiration.
content:
[hr]Spike I've always enjoyed how you draw the eyes on your characters.
[hr]Of course. That's because the style takes some inspiration from Keen (as well as the Simpsons).

[hr]Lemur I love the look on the Three Dollars guy's face. I don't know what he was expecting, but I don't think that was it.
[hr]Yeah, I've been addicted to that D: expression since the first time I saw Rejected. It looks so horrified, yet so comical.

[Edit: Hah, for some reason I always seem to get Lemur and Retodon8 mixed up. Quote fixed.]

[hr]Gal You know what your characters remind me of Spleen?

The way they draw lemmings. You know... in the lemmings games.
[hr]So they do. Probably a remnant from the days one of my other cousins and I used to draw lemmings a lot.

I've created more now, but I haven't got a scanner setup here yet. I'll sort that out and post them at my new site when it's running.
